intro:
Strike before you're surrounded.
Fight back with magic circles in this aggressive escape game.
description:
Enemies hop across the board like chess knights.

As the player, you must dodge and weave while laying magical circles beneath your feet, striking back with precise timing.The brief delay before a magic circle activates can make all the difference between victory and defeat.

Feel the thrill of taking out multiple enemies at once.Savor the rush of narrowly surviving each encounter.The constant tension keeps you coming back for more.

Every decision shapes the next move, offering fresh strategic challenges with each playthrough.

Compete against players worldwide through online rankings.Can you survive longer, defeat stronger foes, and climb to the top?

Step into the arena, place your magic circles, and face the knights.
